page.title: 04THE NEW HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: In total the amount of land being used is 360 acres. The estate stretches out westwards to{Netley Marsh}and southwards to{Hounsdown.}There will be 3,460 houses in all. Some of the houses are for single people - a one-roomed flat. This flat includes :- built in bed, washing machine, cooker, toilet, storage heater,carpets and curtains - in fact you don't need to have anything except yourself and a knife and fork. There are also one-bedroom houses. These are also furnished. The larger houses are four-bedroom. All the houses and flats have small gardens and all have either garages and parking spaces. Most of the houses have gas heating. It will take roughly up to the year 1994 to finish building all the houses.
